00172 class CrossEntropy : virtual public ModelInterface {
00173     // This value is used instead of log of a small number to avoid numerical instabilities. 
00174   // This value is chosen, as minLog = log(0) on a unix system.
00175   const static double minLog=-730;
00176   const static double maxDeriv=1e300;
00177   const static double maxexp=1e300;
00178  public:
00179 
00180 //===========================================================================
00212   double error(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target) {
00213     double ce=0;
00214     double smaxsum;
00215 
00216     if (outputDimension>1)
00217       // more then one output neuron
00218       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00219         Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00220         model(in, output);
00221         smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00222         output/=smaxsum;
00223         for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++)
00224           if(target(c) != 0) 
00225             if(output(c) != 0.)
00226               ce -= target(c) * log( output(c) ) ;
00227             else
00228               ce -= minLog;
00229       } else {
00230         Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00231         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00232           model(in[pattern], output);
00233           smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00234           output/=smaxsum;
00235           for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++)
00236             if(target(pattern, c) != 0)
00237               if(output(c) != 0.) 
00238                 ce -= target(pattern, c) * log( output(c) );
00239               else
00240                 ce -= minLog;   
00241         }
00242       }
00243     else{
00244       // only one output neuron
00245       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00246         // one pattern
00247         Array<double> output(1);
00248         model(in, output);
00249         if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00250           ce -= (target(0)*log(output(0)) + (1. - target(0)) * log(1. - output(0)));
00251         else if (output(0)!=target(0))
00252           ce -= minLog;
00253       } else {
00254         // more then one pattern
00255         Array<double> output(1);
00256         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00257           model(in[pattern], output);
00258           if ((output(0) != 0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00259             ce -= target(pattern, 0) * log(output(0)) + (1. - target(pattern, 0)) * log(1. - output(0));
00260           else if (output(0) != target(pattern, 0))
00261             ce -= minLog;         
00262         }
00263       }
00264     }
00265     return ce;
00266   }

00315   double derror(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target, bool returnError=true) {
00316     dedw = 0;
00317     double ce = 0;
00318     double smaxsum;
00319     double isconsistent = 0;
00320 
00321     if (outputDimension > 1) {
00322       // more then one output neuron
00323       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00324         // one input pattern
00325         //std::cout << "derror: Hallo x-Out 1-pattern! CE" << std::endl;
00326         Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00327         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00328         dmodel(in, output);
00329         smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00330         output/=smaxsum;
00331         if (returnError){
00332           // calculate cross entropy
00333           for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++)
00334             if(target(c) != 0) 
00335               if(output(c) != 0.)
00336                 ce -= target(c) * log( output(c) ) ;
00337               else
00338                 ce -= minLog;
00339         }
00340         // calculate derivative dedw
00341         for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++){
00342           isconsistent += target(c);
00343           for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00344             dedw(i) += (output(c)-target(c)) * dmdw(c, i);
00345         }
00346         if(isconsistent !=1){
00347           std::cerr << std::endl << "Crossentropy: teacher labels do not sum to unity!" << std::endl;
00348           exit(0);
00349         }
00350           
00351       } else {
00352         // more than one input pattern
00353         //std::cout << "derror: Hallo x-Out x-pattern! CE" << std::endl;
00354         Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00355         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00356         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00357           isconsistent = 0;
00358           dmodel(in[pattern], output);
00359           smaxsum=smaxnorm(output);
00360           output/=smaxsum;
00361           if (returnError){
00362             // calculate cross-entropy
00363             for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++)
00364               if(target(pattern, c) != 0)
00365                 if(output(c) != 0.) 
00366                   ce -= target(pattern, c) * log( output(c) );
00367                 else
00368                   ce -= minLog; 
00369           }
00370           // calculate derivative dedw
00371           for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++){
00372             isconsistent += target(pattern,c);
00373             for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00374               dedw(i) += (output(c)-target(pattern,c)) * dmdw(c, i);
00375           }
00376           if(isconsistent !=1){
00377             std::cerr << std::endl << "Crossentropy: teacher labels do not sum to unity!" << std::endl;
00378             exit(0);
00379           }
00380         }
00381       }
00382     } else {
00383       // one output neuron
00384       if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00385         // only one pattern
00386         Array<double> output(1);
00387         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00388         dmodel(in, output);
00389         if (returnError){
00390           // calculate ce
00391           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0))
00392             ce -= (target(0) * log(output(0)) + (1. -target(0)) * log(1. - output(0)));
00393           else if (output(0) != target(0)) 
00394             ce -= minLog;
00395         }
00396         // calculate derivative dedw
00397         for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00398           if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0) != 0)){
00399             dedw(i) -= (target(0) - output(0)) / (output(0) * (1. - output(0))) * dmdw(0, i);
00400           } else { 
00401             if (output(0) != target(0)){
00402               // the sign changes due to the value of the target,
00403               dedw(i) -= (2. * target(0) - 1.) * maxDeriv * dmdw(0, i);
00404             }
00405           }
00406       } else {
00407         // a number of patterns
00408         Array<double> output(1);
00409         coeffs.resize(output.nelem(),false);
00410         for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00411           dmodel(in[pattern], output);//
00412           if (returnError){
00413             // calculate ce
00414             if ((output(0) != 0) && (1. - output(0) != 0))
00415               ce -= target(pattern, 0) * log(output(0)) + (1. - target(pattern, 0)) * log(1. - output(0));
00416             else  if (output(0)!=target(pattern,0))
00417                 ce -= minLog;
00418           }
00419           // calculate derivative dedw    
00420           for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00421             if ((output(0)!=0) && (1. - output(0)!=0)){
00422              dedw(i) -=(target(pattern, 0)-output(0)) / (output(0) * (1. - output(0))) * dmdw(0, i);
00423             } else { 
00424               if (output(0) != target(pattern, 0)){
00425                 // the sign changes due to the value of the target, maxDeriv is devided by reason of computational bounds
00426                 dedw(i)-=(2. * target(pattern, 0) - 1.) * maxDeriv / in.dim(0) * dmdw(0, i);
00427               }
00428             }
00429         }
00430       }
00431     }
00432     if (!returnError)
00433       ce = -1;
00434     return ce;
00435   }
00436   
00437  private:
00438   double norm(Array<double> &output) {
00439     double sum = 0;
00440     if(output.ndim() == 1) {
00441       for(unsigned i = 0; i < output.nelem(); i++) sum += output(i);
00442     } else {
00443       exit(1);
00444     }
00445     return sum;
00446   }
00447 
00448   double smaxnorm(Array<double> &output) {
00449     double sum = 0;
00450     if(output.ndim() == 1) {
00451       for(unsigned i = 0; i < output.nelem(); i++) {
00452         if(output(i)<301)
00453           output(i)=exp(output(i));
00454         else output(i)=maxexp/output.nelem();
00455         sum += output(i);
00456       }
00457     } else {
00458       exit(1);
00459     }
00460     return sum;
00461   }
00462   Array<double> coeffs;  
00463 };
00464 #endif
